name: Finger Fury Rage
description:
Watch out for your five fingers!
Tap the more you can to make more points and earn money, but try not to make any mistakes or you'll have to start again!!!

Try to earn a lot of money and unlock the 9 all hands!

How far can you get?

Have fun with this funny game it's totally free!

FEATURES:
• Simple Gameplay!
• 9 Funny Hands to Unlock!
• Cool Toon Graphics!
• Tweet Sheet and Leaderboards!
•One Touch to Play!
